column4: which torrent client will let me seed more then one file at a time?
almost all of them
in fact I can't think of one that won't
only one i got to work was the default one that came with ubuntu.. but i cant open more then one file cause it says that the port is in use
gnome-desktop is a meta package, it doesn't matter just remove it
yes ubuntu-desktop I meant too, weird that we both erred
so its ok to remove that? that wont mess up my desktop?
yes remove it, it is one of the unfortunate flaws of apt that it is even necessary
$(dpkg -L bittornado | grep \/usr\/bin)
what do i do with that?
copy and paste it
bash: /usr/bin: is a directory
copy and paste the entire thing at once including the dollar parenthesis
i did and i put it in terminal and it gave me that
ok do this: $(dpkg -L bittornado | grep \/usr\/bin/.)
ok do this: $(dpkg -L bittornado | grep \/usr\/bin\/.)
did you do that second one?
yea got an error   http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/31036/
looks like the app is broken or there are missing dependencies

checking mirrors could mean that it is going through each of them to test speed which would obviously take some time, abstraction makes it hard to understand what is going on so yeah could be that. Hooray gui.
its been at 82% for the past 20 mins lol
well user-friendliness takes precedence over usefulness so just wait I guess or kill it, whichever
